title: Aamir Khan has clarified that he is not the person who is putting money in wheat bags
subtitle: Aamir Khan has clarified that he is not the person who is putting money in the wheat bags. He said that the story is either fake or some person who does not want to get revealed might be doing such donations.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A piece of news that Bollywood actor Aamir Khan is helping the needy during the lockdown in a unique way by sending flour bags with cash in them is being shared widely on social media. But FACTLY has found the news to be fake. On Twitter, Aamir Khan himself has clarified about this. In his tweet, Aamir Khan has said that he is not the person who is putting money in the wheat bags. He said that the story is either fake or some person who does not want to get revealed might be making such donations.
